places.name: Chinatown Square
places.description: Outdoor plaza with shops and zodiac statues at the heart of Chinatown. Features traditional Chinese architecture and hosts various cultural events throughout the year.

places.name: Nine Dragon Wall
places.description: A colorful replica of Beijing's Nine-Dragon Wall, featuring intricate ceramic dragons and traditional Chinese artistry. Perfect spot for photos and cultural appreciation.

places.name: Ping Tom Memorial Park
places.description: Scenic riverside park with stunning Chicago skyline views and pagoda-style pavilion. Popular for walking, jogging, and family gatherings with playgrounds and picnic areas.

places.name: Cermak-Chinatown Station (Red Line)
places.description: CTA Red Line station serving Chinatown along Cermak Road. Features beautiful Chinese-inspired architecture and provides easy access to downtown Chicago.

places.name: Lao Sze Chuan
places.description: Renowned Sichuan restaurant famous for authentic spicy dishes like dry chili chicken, mapo tofu, and hand-pulled noodles. A must-visit for lovers of bold, fiery flavors.

places.name: Chiu Quon Bakery
places.description: Traditional Chinese bakery established in 1986, known for fresh baked buns, pastries, and authentic Chinese sweets. Try their famous BBQ pork buns and egg tarts.

places.name: Chinatown Visitor Center
places.description: Your guide to dining, shopping, and sightseeing in this vibrant community. Enjoy free maps, hanfu try-ons, guided tours, fun workshops, Chinatown-exclusive souvenirs, coupons, and pedicab service.

places.name: Chinatown Public Library
places.description: A modern community hub offering books, technology, and cultural programs that celebrate Chinese heritage and serve residents and visitors alike.

places.name: Chinatown Gateway
places.description: The Chinatown Gateway is a grand ornamental arch marking the entrance to Chicago’s Chinatown, inscribed with the phrase “The world belongs to the people,” symbolizing welcome, unity, and cultural pride.

places.name: Pui Tak Center
places.description: The Pui Tak Center is a historic landmark and community hub in Chicago’s Chinatown, offering educational, cultural, and social services within its beautifully restored 1920s building.

places.name: Jaslin Hotel
places.description: A modern boutique hotel in the heart of Chicago’s Chinatown, offering comfortable accommodations with easy access to dining, shopping, and downtown attractions.

places.name: Springhill Suites by Marriot
places.description: A contemporary all-suite hotel offering spacious accommodations, modern amenities, and convenient access to the vibrant culture and cuisine of Chinatown.

places.name: Sweet Floral
places.description: A charming flower shop in Chicago’s Chinatown specializing in fresh floral arrangements, custom designs, and gifts for any occasion.

places.name: Buddhism Friendship Association
places.description: A cultural and religious center dedicated to promoting Buddhist teachings, community engagement, and intercultural friendship.

places.name: Chinese American Museum of Chicago
places.description: The Chinese American Museum of Chicago preserves and showcases the history, culture, and contributions of Chinese Americans through engaging exhibits and educational programs.

places.name: Daebak Korean BBQ
places.address: 2017 S Wells St Square, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: Industrial-chic venue offering table-grilled Korean BBQ & other classics amid industrial decor.

places.name: Hunan Cuisine
places.address: 2002 S Wentworth Ave Unit 100, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A vibrant restaurant in Chinatown serving authentic, bold-flavored Hunan dishes known for their spiciness and rich, savory flavors.

places.name: Imperial Restaurant
places.description: A Hong Kong-style dim sum restaurant serving a variety of bite-sized dumplings, buns, and savory dishes, perfect for sharing and enjoying traditional Cantonese flavors.

places.name: Ken Kee Restaurant
places.description: A beloved Chinatown spot serving authentic Hong Kong–style comfort food, noodles, and café classics in a lively, modern setting.

places.name: Kung Fu Tea
places.description: A popular bubble tea shop known for its freshly brewed teas, customizable drinks, and wide variety of classic and creative flavors.

places.name: Zhangliang Malatang Chicago
places.address: 2002 S Wentworth Ave STE 102, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A vibrant hot pot eatery where guests customize their own bowls with fresh ingredients and enjoy authentic, spicy Sichuan-style flavors.

places.name: New Great Wall BBQ
places.description: A lively Chinatown restaurant specializing in authentic Chinese-style barbecue, featuring tender roasted meats and traditional flavorful dishes.

places.name: QingXiangYuan Dumplings
places.description: A popular eatery specializing in handmade dumplings, noodles, and authentic Northern Chinese comfort food.

places.name: Szechuan Bistro
places.address: 2002 S Wentworth Ave B10, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A Chicago Chinatown restaurant known for its bold, spicy flavors and authentic Sichuan dishes that showcase the signature heat and numbing spice of Chinese cuisine.

places.name: Tiger Sugar
places.address: 2116 S Archer Ave 1st Floor, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A famous bubble tea shop in Chicago’s Chinatown known for its signature brown sugar boba milk and rich, creamy flavors crafted with freshly prepared ingredients.

places.name: Ume Tea
places.address: 2002 S Wentworth Ave Ste 101, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A trendy tea shop offering handcrafted bubble teas, fruit teas, and creative drinks made with fresh ingredients and vibrant flavors.

places.name: Veggie House
places.description: A popular vegetarian restaurant serving a wide variety of flavorful plant-based Chinese dishes in a casual, family-friendly setting.

places.name: Yep Kitchen
places.address: 2108 S Archer Ave 1st Floor, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A contemporary eatery offering a wide selection of classic Chinese dishes and customizable hot pot in a casual, welcoming atmosphere.

places.name: B.B.Q. King
places.description: A vibrant restaurant specializing in traditional Hong Kong-style barbecue, offering a variety of roasted meats and flavorful, casual dining options.

places.name: Bonchon Korean Fried Chicken
places.description: A popular eatery known for its crispy, double-fried Korean-style chicken, flavorful sauces, and casual, vibrant dining atmosphere.

places.name: Chi Café
places.description: A cozy eatery offering a variety of comforting Asian-inspired dishes, including noodles, rice bowls, and house specialties, in a casual, welcoming setting.

places.name: Daboba Tea
places.description: A trendy bubble tea shop famous for its roasted brown sugar milk, chewy tapioca pearls, and a variety of freshly brewed, customizable drinks.

places.name: Hing Kee Restaurant
places.description: A family-friendly eatery known for serving some of the city’s best dumplings and soup noodles in a casual, welcoming atmosphere.

places.name: Joy Yee
places.description: A vibrant pan-Asian restaurant and café known for its extensive menu of Asian fusion dishes, fresh smoothies, and colorful bubble teas.

places.name: Kajiken Japanese
places.address: 2161 S China Pl Unit A, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A cozy Japanese eatery in Chinatown specializing in authentic mazemen, or brothless ramen, served with flavorful sauces and fresh toppings.

places.name: Lee Wing Wah
places.description: A longtime favorite serving traditional Cantonese dishes, noodles, and stir-fries in a casual, family-style setting.

places.name: MCCB Restaurant
places.description: Warm, casual outlet offering elevated & modern Sichuan & Canton fare such as charcoal grilled fish.

places.name: Mango Mango Dessert
places.address: 2161 S China Pl 2nd fl, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A popular dessert café specializing in fresh, sweet mango-based treats, shaved ice, and refreshing Asian-inspired desserts.

places.name: Matcha En
places.description: A contemporary café specializing in authentic Japanese matcha drinks, desserts, and tea-based beverages in a modern, relaxing setting.

places.name: Minghin Cuisine
places.description: A renowned restaurant offering an extensive menu of authentic Cantonese dishes, including dim sum, seafood, and classic Chinese favorites in an elegant setting.

places.name: Saint's Alp Teahouse
places.description: A cozy café specializing in Taiwanese-style bubble teas, milk teas, fruit drinks, and light snacks in a relaxed, modern setting.

places.name: Te'Amo Bubble Tea
places.address: 2169 A S China Pl, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A health-focused tea shop dedicated to sharing the tradition, culture, and wellness benefits of tea through handcrafted drinks made with the highest quality organic ingredients.

places.name: Ahjoomah's Apron Korean Restaurant
places.description: Korean fare such as bibimbap, kalbi & bulgogi, soups, appetizers & stir-fries in ultramodern eatery.

places.name: Chef Xiong's Taste of Szechuan
places.description: Traditional Sichuan cuisine including specialty hot pots, served in a colorful modern setting.

places.name: Dongpo Impression
places.description: Unpretentious Chinese restaurant highlighting regional specialties from Sichuan with a BYOB policy.

places.name: Golden Bull Restaurant
places.description: Long-running sit-down spot for classic Chinese plates like chow mein & orange chicken.

places.name: Phoenix Restaurant
places.description: No-frills standby for numerous authentic offerings from rolling carts plus standard Chinese dishes.

places.name: Sushi Plus
places.description: A modern Japanese restaurant featuring a rotating sushi bar and a variety of fresh sushi, sashimi, and Japanese dishes in a lively, casual setting.

places.name: Yao Yao Restaurant
places.description: A Bib Gourmand–recognized eatery specializing in fiery Szechuan cuisine, including its signature Yao Yao pickled fish, spicy wontons, and a variety of flavorful traditional dishes.

places.name: Emperors Choice
places.description: An elegant restaurant offering a wide selection of authentic Cantonese dishes, fresh seafood, and classic dim sum in a refined dining atmosphere.

places.name: Evergreen Restaurant
places.description: Standard Cantonese fare, with Sichuan & Hunan specialties, in a simple setting. Delivery available.

places.name: Gao's Kabob BBQ
places.description: A lively restaurant specializing in authentic Chinese-style grilled skewers, spicy street food, and late-night dining in a fun, casual atmosphere.

places.name: Go 4 Food Restaurant
places.description: A casual eatery offering a variety of affordable Chinese dishes, from classic stir-fries to noodle bowls, in a quick-service, family-friendly setting.

places.name: Gourmet Food
places.description: Unfussy, no-frills stop offering traditional Chinese classics from congee to pork dumplings.

places.name: Happy Lamb Hot Pot
places.description: A vibrant restaurant specializing in customizable hot pot meals with fresh ingredients, flavorful broths, and a lively, communal dining experience.

places.name: Legend Dumpling & Bao
places.description: A popular eatery specializing in handmade dumplings, fluffy bao, and authentic Northern Chinese comfort food in a casual, welcoming setting.

places.name: Legend Tasty House
places.description: A rolled ice cream shop bringing the vibrant flavors and tastes of Thailand to the city for a fun and memorable dessert experience.

places.name: Liuyishou Hotpot
places.description: A renowned Chongqing-style hot pot restaurant offering premium meats, fresh ingredients, and flavorful broths for an authentic and interactive Sichuan dining experience.

places.name: Original triple Crown Restaurant
places.description: Chinese joint with traditional decor & late hours offering a wide selection, including dim sum.

places.name: Shinhwa Korean Steakhouse
places.description: All-you-can-eat grill featuring Korean menu items like hot pots, beef and pork and grilled meats.

places.name: Slurp Slurp Noodles
places.description: Unassuming eatery turning out a big variety of Chinese noodle bowls & soups in relaxed surrounds.

places.name: Tai Ho Yee Food
places.description: A casual eatery specializing in quality Cantonese barbecue, including tender roast duck and other classic BBQ dishes.

places.name: Three Happiness Restaurant
places.description: A welcoming Cantonese dim sum eatery offering a wide variety of traditional and modern dishes, including vegetarian options, with dine-in, takeout, delivery, and catering services.

places.name: Triple Crown Restaurant
places.description: Large, casual restaurant serving dim sum & Cantonese classics until the wee hours.

places.name: Wentworth Seafood House
places.description: Seafood-focused Cantonese dishes along with bubble tea served in an easygoing atmosphere.

places.name: Shoo Loong Kan Hotpot
places.address: 2201 S Wentworth Ave 1st Fl, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A popular restaurant specializing in authentic Sichuan hot pot and a wide variety of traditional Chinese dishes.

places.name: Xi'an Cuisine
places.description: A vibrant restaurant specializing in authentic Xi’an street foods, flavorful Szechuan dishes, and a diverse selection of Chinese American favorites

places.name: Jiang Niu BBQ
places.description: A unique Korean Chinese fusion  BBQ experience, combining sweet, spicy, and savory flavors with tableside grilling for a fun and flavorful dining adventure.

places.name: Qiao Lin Hotpot
places.address: 2105 S Jefferson St Suite A, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: Qiao Lin Hotpot in Chicago’s Chinatown offers an authentic Chongqing hot pot experience, delivering bold, spicy flavors and a memorable dining adventure for heat-loving food enthusiasts.

places.name: Tous Les Jours
places.address: 2144 S Archer Ave unit a, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: Relaxed shop for Asian-French baked goods, including cakes, breads and croissants.

places.name: Paris Baguette
places.description: A modern bakery and café offering a variety of freshly baked breads, pastries, cakes, and beverages inspired by French and Korean flavors.

places.name: No.1 Salon
places.address: 2113 S China Pl a, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A modern beauty salon offering haircuts, styling, coloring, and professional hair care services in a welcoming and contemporary setting.

places.name: Headquater Salon
places.description: A trendy full-service salon offering expert haircuts, coloring, and styling in a modern and relaxing atmosphere.

places.name: UwU Nails
places.address: Second Floor, 2143 S China Pl Unit B 2nd floor, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A stylish nail salon offering professional manicures, pedicures, and creative nail art in a cozy and relaxing environment.

places.name: Volar Salon
places.description: A contemporary salon offering expert haircuts, coloring, and styling services with a focus on personalized beauty and modern trends.

places.name: 88 Marketplace
places.address: 2105 S Jefferson St Floor 2, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A vibrant supermarket specializing in Asian foods, fresh produce, and snacks, featuring a food court with dim sum and other popular Asian dishes, along with a variety of restaurant and gift stores.

places.name: Park to Shop
places.description: Large Asian grocery offering fresh-cut meats as well as produce & imported frozen & dry goods.

places.name: Ichiban Candy & Snacks
places.description: A specialty shop offering a wide variety of Japanese and Asian candies, snacks, and treats for all ages to enjoy.

places.name: Rong City Houseware & Restaurant Supply
places.description: A comprehensive store offering kitchenware, cookware, and restaurant supplies for both home cooks and professional chefs.

places.name: BG Gift Shop Souvenir & Anime
places.description: A specialty store offering a variety of unique souvenirs, anime merchandise, and collectible items for fans and visitors alike.

places.name: ZHM Express
places.description: A convenient shop offering international shipping, package delivery, and logistics services for customers sending goods between the U.S. and Asia.

places.name: Sakura Karaoke Bar
places.description: A lively entertainment spot offering private karaoke rooms, drinks, and snacks for friends to sing, relax, and have fun together.

places.name: No.18 Karaoke Bar
places.description: A vibrant nightlife venue featuring private karaoke rooms, a full bar, and a lively atmosphere for friends and groups to enjoy singing and socializing.

places.name: Heritage Museum of Asian Art
places.address: 3500 S Morgan St 3rd Fl, Chicago, IL 60609
places.description: A cultural institution dedicated to preserving, exhibiting, and educating visitors about the rich artistic traditions and history of Asia.

places.name: Chinese American Veteran's Memorial
places.address: Cermak St, and Archer Ave, Chicago, IL 60616
places.description: A commemorative monument honoring the service and sacrifices of Chinese American veterans throughout U.S. history.
